long_description: The light and compact Carson X-Scope optical tool packs 7 functions into a single pocket tool. It's perfect for young naturalists who want to explore the outdoors, right down to the tiniest detail. Functions include a 30x microscope, 8x telescope, 9x fold-out magnifier, LED flashlight, signal whistle, directional compass and digital clock.
short_description: The light and compact Carson X-Scope optical tool packs 7 functions into a single pocket tool. It's perfect for young naturalists who want to explore the outdoors, right down to the tiniest detail.
